programme.desc: Gedurende het afgelopen auto- en motorsportseizoen hebben Shelly Sterk en Chris Zegers samen met hun gasten alle ins en outs, alle hoogtepunten en dieptepunten en de beste analyses van de Formule 1, MotoGP, Indycar, NASCAR en vele andere klasses de revue laten passeren in het Ziggo Sport Race Café. programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de eerste aflevering staat de hoekschop centraal. Wat is het geheim van een goede hoekschop en waarom veert het thuispubliek altijd op terwijl maar 4 procent van alle hoekschoppen een goal oplevert? Met hulp van o.a. analyticus Arnold Bruggink, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én cornerspecialist Nourdin Boukhari gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de eerste aflevering staat de hoekschop centraal. Wat is het geheim van een goede hoekschop en waarom veert het thuispubliek altijd op terwijl maar 4 procent van alle hoekschoppen een goal oplevert? Met hulp van o.a. analyticus Arnold Bruggink, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én cornerspecialist Nourdin Boukhari gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

Fitzpatrick: The Boss of Brookline
programme.desc: Reflect on Matt Fitzpatrick's famous U.S. Open win at Brookline Country Club and his career trajectory. Featuring exclusive interviews with his family, Caddie Billy Foster and more.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: As winter descends, hear from former professional Nick Dougherty as he shares his Tee Time Tips to help you improve your game out on the golf course.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2023 Highlights
programme.desc: Day four of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open - the final DP World Tour event of the year - at Heritage La Réserve Golf Club. It was a resounding win for Antoine Rozner in 2022. (17.12)

programme.title: Players Championship 2019 Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 Players Championship from the iconic Stadium Course at TPC Sawgrass in Florida. It would be a week to remember for a certain Northern Irishman.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Max Homa Part 1
programme.desc: Multiple-time PGA TOUR winner Max Homa joins Bones on the course, and shares the tips and strategies that have led to his global success. Part 1.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Max Homa Part 2
programme.desc: Multiple-time PGA TOUR winner Max Homa joins Bones on the course, and shares the tips and strategies that have led to his global success. Part 2.

programme.title: Golf Academy:Woosnam Scoring Irons
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former Masters champion Ian Woosnam on scoring well with irons.

programme.title: Golf Academy
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, English star Matthew Fitzpatrick offers some of his top tips.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Danny Willett
programme.desc: 2016 Masters champion Danny Willett joins the Golf Academy to discuss his career and give some helpful advice.

programme.title: Golf Academy
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, English star Matthew Fitzpatrick offers some of his top tips.

programme.title: Legends Tour Golf Magazine
programme.desc: Firmly established on the Legends Tour calendar, a look at the MCB Mauritius Legends - held at Constance Belle Mare Plage.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Ryder Cup, as Team Europe claimed a first away victory since 2012 - defeating Keegan Bradley's Team USA in New York at Bethpage Black.

programme.title: Live DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: Day three of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing.

programme.title: The Golf Channel Games Highlights
programme.desc: At Trump National Golf Club, Team Rory McIlroy goes up against Team Scottie Scheffler during the Golf Channel Games - a new rapid-fire competition including a number of challenges.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Darren Clarke
programme.desc: As a child, Clarke longed to be The Open champion. As a veteran, against all odds, he succeeded. This is an emotional story of a golfer refusing to give up on his dream.

programme.title: Open Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 153rd Open Championship. Taking place at Royal Portrush in Northern Ireland, Scottie Scheffler became champion golfer of the year for the first time in his career.

programme.title: AIG Women's Open Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 AIG Women's Open. Taking place at Royal Porthcawl in Wales, Japan's Miyu Yamashita claimed victory - finishing two shots clear at the summit.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Day three of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing. (19.12)

programme.title: Live PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: Opening-round action from the PGA Tour's PNC Championship.

programme.title: PGA Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 107th PGA Championship, an event in which Scottie Scheffler claimed his first Wanamaker Trophy and third major victory overall at Quail Hollow Club.

programme.title: Masters Official Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the unforgettable 2025 Masters, where Rory McIlroy ended his agonising wait for the career Grand Slam in a dramatic play-off with Ryder Cup teammate Justin Rose.

programme.title: ANWA Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Augusta National Women's Amateur, as an international field of top women's amateur golfers convened at the world-famous venue.

programme.title: Steel Magnolia: Willett's Masters
programme.desc: Relive all of the drama with a look at Danny Willett's 2016 Masters win. The Sheffield man took a stunning final-day victory to win his maiden green jacket.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open, held at Mont Choisy Le Golf. Last year, Louis Oosthuizen completed back-to-back wins on the DP World Tour with victory here.

programme.title: Players Championship 2021 Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2021 PLAYERS Championship, which returned to the PGA Tour after cancellation in 2020. It was a week to remember for Justin Thomas.

programme.desc: Former and current pros take viewers behind the ropes on the course, discussing such things as shot setup, club selection, and strategy. Here, Patty Tavatanakit leads the lesson.

programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former star Colin Montgomerie offers advice on using the driver.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Woosnam Power
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former Masters champion Ian Woosnam with his top tips on generating power.

programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, the climactic event of the Ladies European Tour season taking place at Real Guadalhorce Club de Golf.

programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach. It would take a play-off between JJ Spaun and Rory McIlroy to decide the fate of the 51st edition.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing. (20.12)

programme.title: Beyond The Scorecard
programme.desc: Josh travels to the home of golf, St Andrews, where he connects with women transforming golf's culture, spotlighting inclusion and representation in the sport. (2 of 5)

programme.title: Live PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: Round two of the PGA Tour's PNC Championship.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Ryder Cup, as Team Europe claimed a first away victory since 2012 - defeating Keegan Bradley's Team USA in New York at Bethpage Black.

programme.title: Tales From The Ryder Cup
programme.desc: Chapter One: Exploring the origins of the Ryder Cup, the famously raucous New York City crowds encapsulate the spirit of one of the world's most anticipated sporting events. (1 of 3)

programme.title: Tales From The Ryder Cup
programme.desc: Chapter Two: Featuring stories from the 2004, 2008 and 2012 editions of the world-famous event, enjoy a deep dive into the minds of Ryder Cup legends. (2 of 3)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: Venus v Serena 2001
programme.desc: The 2001 US Open women's singles final witnessed the first career Grand Slam final meeting between Venus and Serena Williams. At just 21 and 19 years old, the pair would go on to dominate.

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the 2024 Berlin Ladies Open in Germany. Here, fourth seed Jessica Pegula faced Anna Kalinskaya. Who will be crowned champion? (23.06)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: British tennis legend Tim Henman joins Gigi Salmon on the Sky Sports Tennis podcast to answer 10 questions about his life and career.

programme.title: Billie Jean King: My Story
programme.desc: Billie Jean King discusses her life story, including her ongoing fight for equality and the victories on and off the court that have shaped her into the legend she is today.

programme.title: Martina Navratilova: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Martina Navratilova sits down with Gigi Salmon for an in-depth interview about her life, tennis career and the challenges she has overcome.

programme.title: Venus v Davenport 2000
programme.desc: The 2000 US Open women's singles final saw an all-American affair, as Venus Williams, making her fourth appearance here, met the world number one, Lindsay Davenport.

programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: Doha SF: Draper v Lehecka
programme.desc: Revisit one of the standout matches from yesterday's action on the ATP Tour. Here, Britain's Jack Draper met Jiri Lehecka in the semi-finals of the Qatar Open.

programme.desc: Revisit a standout match from yesterday's action at the Madrid Open.

programme.title: Indian Wells: Draper v Alcaraz
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper gets set for a clash with the two-time defending champion Carlos Alcaraz, as the Briton competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 semi-final at Indian Wells. (15.03)

programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: Stosur v Serena 2011
